channel.title: postgresql on Pensieve
channel.description: Recent content in postgresql on Pensieve

item.title: PostgreSQL
item.description: Tunning https://wiki.postgresql.org/wiki/Tuning_Your_PostgreSQL_Server Konfigurations Parameter https://www.postgresql.org/docs/current/static/runtime-config.html Error codes https://www.postgresql.org/docs/9.5/static/errcodes-appendix.html Anzeigen von offenen Datenbankverbindungen SELECT * FROM pg_stat_activity; https://www.postgresql.org/message-id/200404260720.i3Q7KaxE030841%40lurza.secnetix.de Kill aktive Verbindungen SELECT pg_terminate_backend(pid int) Beende alle Verbindungen bis auf die eigene SELECT pg_terminate_backend(pg_stat_activity.pid) FROM pg_stat_activity WHERE pg_stat_activity.datname = 'TARGET_DB' AND pid <> pg_backend_pid(); Verzeichnisstruktur mit ltree http://www.postgresonline.com/journal/archives/173-Using-LTree-to-Represent-and-Query-Hierarchy-and-Tree-Structures.html https://www.postgresql.org/docs/current/static/ltree.html
